member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.Monster
member.summary: Represents a monster.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Monster.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of this monster.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of this monster.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Monster.CR
member.summary: Gets or sets the combat rank value.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.Source
member.summary: Represents a product source, such as an official book (player's guide, bestiary) or a web product.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Source.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique id for this product source. It can be one of the values of or any custom string. It should be culture insensitive (all pathfinder rpg rulebook are referenced using the "pfrpg" id, ignoring the language used).

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Source.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name for this product source.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Source.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique url for this product.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Source.UrlString
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique url for this product, in a text format.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.Source.Ids
member.summary: Contains most officials ids.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.SpecialBoolean
member.summary: Specifies a boolean which contains a third value named 'special' and used to describe specific conditions.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Spell.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of this spell. It's often generated using its title, replacing spaces by '-' and removing any extra character.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.Spell.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the title (name) of this spell.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.SpellSchool
member.summary: Specifies all spell schools known in pathfinder rpg.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.SpellTarget
member.summary: Describe a target for a spell.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.SpellTarget.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value describing the target.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit
member.summary: Specifies the units of time which can be used to describe a timed element.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.Special
member.summary: The unit of time can not be described using a unit of time. It can be a conditional value, or a range.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.SimpleAction
member.summary: A simple action, as described in pathfinder combat rules.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.ImmediateAction
member.summary: An immediate action, as described in pathfinder combat rules.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.SwiftAction
member.summary: A swift action, as described in pathfinder combat rules.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.FullRoundAction
member.summary: A full round action, as described in pathfinder combat rules.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.Round
member.summary: One or more rounds. A round is a unit of time in pathfinder rpg consisting of six seconds.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.Minute
member.summary: One or more minutes.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.Hour
member.summary: One or more hours.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.TimeUnit.Day
member.summary: One or more days.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.WeightAmount
member.summary: Describes a weight, using a value and a unit.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.WeightAmount.Unit
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit used to describe the weight.

member.name: P:PathfinderDb.Schema.WeightAmount.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value sued to describe the weight.

member.name: T:PathfinderDb.Schema.WeightUnit
member.summary: Specifies the unit used to describe a weight.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.WeightUnit.Pounds
member.summary: Pounds.

member.name: F:PathfinderDb.Schema.WeightUnit.Kilogram
member.summary: Kilograms.
